summary: An email from a Special Agent at the FBI's New York Office to an unnamed recipient, forwarding attachments related to Maxwell and offering to chat. The attachments appear to be documents about Maxwell from various sources.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email and the attached documents (SM_-_Lexis.pdf, SM_NYC_DOC.pdf, SM_Instagram.pdf).

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.role: Federal Bureau of Investigation Special Agent
persons.context: Sender of the email from the FBI's New York Office, providing documents related to Maxwell.

events.title: Email correspondence regarding Maxwell documents
events.description: A Special Agent sends an email with attached documents related to Maxwell to an unnamed recipient.

keyFacts: An FBI Special Agent from the New York Office sent an email on November 18, 2020, regarding documents about Maxwell.
The email included three attachments: SM_-_Lexis.pdf, SM_NYC_DOC.pdf, and SM_Instagram.pdf, suggesting compiled information from legal, official, and social media sources.
The sender offers to 'chat whenever,' indicating ongoing communication or investigation.
The recipient is not named, referred to only as 'man'.
